summary: Comprehensive testing of Quiz-based Learning Platform completed. Backend APIs fully functional with AI integration working. Frontend has quiz interface navigation issues but all other features operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Quiz interface not loading after successful AI quiz generation
ui_bugs.details: Quiz generation succeeds and returns data, but navigation to quiz interface fails or interface doesn't render quiz content properly. May be related to sessionStorage handling or component loading logic.

integration_issues.issue: Navigation from quiz selection to quiz interface after AI generation
integration_issues.details: Backend successfully generates quiz, frontend receives data, but quiz interface component fails to load/display the generated questions

passed_tests: AI quiz generation via Gemini 3 Pro

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (major features working, quiz interface has issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix quiz interface loading issue: After successful AI quiz generation, the QuizInterface component fails to render quiz content. Check sessionStorage handling in QuizSelection.js line 36 and QuizInterface.js useEffect hook. The backend API works perfectly - issue is purely frontend navigation/rendering.
